plot: Crook arrives at a small village and sets his plan up: he's got a miracle drug said to improve meat and milk production and is intent on selling it to the mayor.
title: ...E a Vaca Foi Para o Brejo
plot_es: Crook arrives at a small village and sets his plan up: he's got a miracle drug said to improve meat and milk production and is intent on selling it to the mayor.
original_name: ...E a Vaca Foi Para o Brejo
plot_en: Crook arrives at a small village and sets his plan up: he's got a miracle drug said to improve meat and milk production and is intent on selling it to the mayor.
